name: Order Reports for WooCommerce
author: GrowCommerce

sections.description:
Order Reports for WooCommerce

Quickly download and show WooCommerce sale reporting

The Order Reports for WooCommerce plugin is easy to integrate with your WooCommerce store. the order reports for the WooCommerce plugin are useful to understanding your business order selling analysis.

The plugin report helps them view data related to their total sale, net sale, total order, shipping, taxes, etc to help to grow their business. also gives the order status-wise sales information.

For order sales analysis, Business users are able to download and view order sales reports including the order items information, shipping and TAX.

REPORTING FEATURES

  • Order summary reports like total sale, net sale, total order, average order value, refund order, refund amount, discount amount, shipping, shipping TAX, TAX.
  • Order status-wise sales performance summary.
  • Download and show orders wise product item details, shipping rate, discount, TAX, total in excel file.
  • Faster performance to display and download sale orders report
  • User has the option to select the date range for the get the orders report detail
  • Sale analytics with multiple sale metrics
  • Order sales report chart represents the various analysis data like Total Sales, Net Sales, Total Orders, Average order value, Refund orders, Refund amount, Discount amount, Total TAX, Order TAX, Shipping TAX, Total shipping, Total users, Unique Users, Orders Status.
sections.faq:
What does the plugin do?

The plugin is useful to show and download Woocommerce Orders detail information and also the Woocommerce product order analytics reports details.

The plugin supports a large number of orders?

Yes, the Order Reports for the WooCommerce plugin gives a faster response to show or download the Woocommerce order detail information.

What are file types support to download the order data?

The plugin is given the excel and csv options to download order report.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0 – 21/12/2023

  • Implement UI enhancements
  • Introduce a PRO plan
  • Ensure compatibility with WooCommerce High-Performance Order Storage tables

1.1.4 – 06/09/2022

  • remove top banner

1.1.3 – 05/06/2022

  • bugfix – while excel file download

1.1.2 – 04/06/2022

  • New – add CSV file option on the download page.
  • New – The plugin pages with new UI

1.1.1 – 04/03/2022

  • bugfix – report chart

1.1.0 – 04/03/2022

  • Add sales report chart with varis analysis

1.0.4 – 06/12/2021

  • Change order date format to numbers
  • add an email address in view order data

1.0.3 – 11/09/2021

  • bugfix – Display quantity in order status wise sales performance report

1.0.2 – 09/09/2021

  • bug fix to show and hide rate us link

1.0.1 – 08/09/2021

  • bug fix of display error notice
  • add rating link

1.0.0

  • Initial release includes with show Woocommerce orders Or downloads Woocommerce orders report in Excel
sections.screenshots:
1. Woocommerce sale order reports overview

  2. Woocommerce store selling order reports download or show options

  3. Woocommerce order charts analysis
sections.reviews:
Good customer service

By vwada10 on January 12, 2024

I reached out to the developers to ask if the plugin was updated to be compatible with HPOS. It wasn't at the time but they made it compatible following my inquiry. They were communicative and responsive. I appreciate that.

not usable for me

By yatgirl on July 30, 2022

- Screens show massive ad for Pixel Manager (another of their plugins) at the top of the screen - check out the screen shots to see this. - does not support custom order numbers - no options for configuration of reports for gross or net - splits shipping out on a separate line resulting in 2 lines for every order.

really good

By Tio Amkar (amkar022) on June 3, 2022

easy to use, good interface!! great job

good

By akshayacku on April 3, 2022

good

Fix date format

By dvarakashop on November 18, 2021

Hey, your really plugin is great, but there is one small problem. I use my native language as default, so when I choose the date from date picker to filter orders, the chosen date is in my native language, but filtering algorithm only works with English date. I suggest to you to use only numbers as a date.

Working fine

By bhavik9033 on September 8, 2021

This plugin was good and nicely work in order report great job 👍
